A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Enough is said about how bad the movie is. There should be some hard lessons for Disney. 

1. Have one good script writer to tie up a trilogy\, instead of letting multiple directors play at their whims and fancy. One bad apple ruins the whole thing.

2. Don't buy your critics!! The truth will be out eventually\, and now Disney not only looks bad for ruining a good franchise\, but appears to be unethical.

Good thing I sold my Disney shares.
